Parameters: String: A localized error message which may be shown to the user, or null if the cause of the error is unclear.
int: The error code, or @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaControlIntent#ERROR_UNKNOWN_E@ if unknown.
Bundle: The error data bundle, or null if none.
onError(java.lang.String, int, android.o.Description: Called when a media control request fails.
onError(java.lang.String, int, android.o.FullName: void onError (String error, int code, Bundle data)

ClassDesc: Base callback type for remote playback requests.
